short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click access/navigation to deal and merchant related resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deal Panel streamlines Groupon employeesâ€™ everyday tasks by providing a one click access/navigation to deal and merchant related resources. In the form of a chrome extension tool or webview on Catfood App (iOS/Android), Deal Panel is beneficial to a customer representative for example to access information about a deal/merchant on the spot while making calls, whereas for a developer, Deal Panel can provide internal deal information while creating feature/testing.
